item.description: Emails sent to the class Welcome to IW11!

item.title: Welcome to Iw11
item.description: Hello all! (TL;DR: fill out the form and check the website for more information) I am writing to welcome you to the Independent Work Seminar on â€œWrestling with Distributed Systems" and to introduce myself as your independent work adviser. Welcome! Almost every major application out there is a distributed system, even things as simple as Microsoft Word or as complicated as the stock market. You interact with distributed systems when you turn on your phone, send an email or message, buy a ticket to a concert, or do almost any basic activity as part of daily life.
